Basic details: Emily Carter, a 24-year-old female, presents to the clinic with regular pain during sexual intercourse.
Vitals:
BP: 120/75 mm Hg
Temp: 98.4°F (36.9°C)
RR: 18/minute
HR: 78/minute, regular
Physical presentation:
Sit on the examination table and express discomfort when discussing sexual activity.
Place your hand on your lower abdomen when describing the pain.
If pelvic exam is mentioned by the examinee, ask, “What does that involve?”
Challenging question: “Is this something serious? Will it affect my ability to have children?”
